name: Christine Fowler
text: Doesnt everyone love Pizza Hut!? This location has curbside service as well as pick up and delivery. Good food as always. The service is quick.

name: pete karambelas
text: Absolutely filthy! The dirt in the credit card machine and printer are unbelievable. You can imagine the rest of this place.

text: Had good pizza food was hot and ready pretty clean good manners and good waitresses and waiters

text: Food was good but the restrooms were aweful

name: Chris Sax
text: Good service, and some pretty sweet specials!

name: Tracey Hanson

name: Randy Maness
text: They have a call center; it‚Äôs worthless, and they get nothing right.  I just hung up after so many mistake!

text: I had take out and I was a little late to pick up my order and the food was hot and stayed hot for my family to eat when I got home. I just luv Pizza Hut!

name: Joann Bagwell
text: Great service üòä

name: phil berryman
text: The young lady was left to run the place by herself. No cook, no waitress, no nothing, just her. With all of this she was kind, and doing everything she could to keep the ship afloat. Yes it took longer to get my food but no compliments here. Give that young lady a bonus for doing about 5 jobs at once!

name: jayde robrson
text: Nobody out Pizza's the Hut. It's actually a great family environment

name: Tabitha Wheeler
text: This is a pic of a pizza my husband ordered after I warned him of going to Pizza hut. Before this I took my son and his friend to eat there. The pizza we received had pools of grease and oil. Never again.

name: Christopher Burns
text: Pizza Hut WingStop in Hartwell, GA might have the best wings aroung here

name: Brittany Alexander
text: My family eat together every weekend. When we decide to have pizza we always go to Pizza Hut because Lakeisha Teasley makes sure the pizza's are fresh and delicious. She also has great customer service. My family truly appreciated your southern hospitality! Pizza Hut is lucky to have you!

name: Cory Bryant
text: Pineapple and ham is the best here.

name: Kathie Dean
text: Great customer service and food!!

name: Addie Adams
text: Great service and food. They have came a long way in the last year.

name: Karen Hilliard
text: The food is delicious, however don‚Äôt even try to get delivery, because they‚Äôll probably call you and ask if you can pick up because either they don‚Äôt have a driver or he is running behind. Sometimes they are out of pasta or chicken. The cookie is usually burnt! But the pizza and pasta are usually awesome

name: Aaron Ricks
text: They are always late with the delivery. An the last I ordered they didn't have a driver for 2 hours. Update just call ahead of time today 2-1-19 at 1.57pm tried to order pizza again an they don't have a driver till 6pm. An this will be my last time ever trying to order again from here.

name: Pete Patel
text: Excellent service

name: Steve Sanders
text: We go to this pizza hut every Saturday. We like the restaurant and the atmosphere here. The staff is very friendly and the service is excellent. We would recommend visiting this pizza hut.

name: Traci Boozer
text: Not the cleanest, more attention to the details-table or booths not clean, crumbs, etc. Once opened silverware remnants of food present. Definitely could use work in cleanliness, especially as one has to eat & want to feel it as clean as possible. The pizza üçï was pretty good.

name: June Couey
text: Pizza and service was good but Pizza Hut really needs a major upgrade

name: Amanda Rudeseal
text: I‚Äôm traveling to hart co. for a wrestling match and was trying to order a personal pan pizza for my son so it would be ready when I arrived. I called two different times and talked two different people to place an order. Each time, I was ‚Ä¶More

name: Brad Adamson
text: We get a pizza once a month....while it's always great, its seems expensive.  Take the survey and get $10 off regular prices....or sign up for e-mail alerts/specials.  Pies are always made the way we ask, really well done and tasteful!! We've not eaten in the dining room only being 2 blocks away.

name: James Blewett
text: I have eaten at Pizza Hut all over the United States. I was in Hartwell on business. Before I left I want to get something to eat. I saw pizza hut and I pulled in. I ordered a medium meat lover's, thin crust. That was by far the worst pizza ‚Ä¶More

text: Always good, even with special orders.

name: Susan Duckworth
text: Pizza was good!

name: Stephanie Roberts
text: Food was prepared correctly. Food was still hot for pickup. Prices are way too high.

name: Amesha Dunkins
text: My family loved Pizza Hut. It is our favorite place to go for pizza in our area.

name: Michael Dorsey
text: THE woman that was working there this past weekend was very nice and keep us happy even though she was the only one waiting on tables

name: Jennifer Cook
text: Pizza Hut in Hartwell is the best pizza hut ever and they have the best waitress ever

name: Vick Vick
text: The pizza is usually correct and very good.  However when the workers yell across the restaurant "did she leave a tip" before we get out of the door with our pick up order it certainly isn't professional.

name: Jennifer Sheriff
text: I have ordered delivery from here twice in the last couple of months.  Both times it has been 2 hours or more before our pizza arrived and it was cold. I will never order from this store again.  Worst service ever!

name: Melinda Jones
text: My granddaughter loves their personal pan pizza with black olives. They know what she wants as soon as we walk in. Great workers there

name: Vanessa Turnbull
text: I made an order online for delivery. It took forever to get my confirmation email with my receipt and when I called the store number to check something in my order the line was completely silent and kept hanging up on me! It is very ‚Ä¶More
